text: Ia uaghan Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ofa gamir gumaziba batoke, kar Aronɨn ovavir boriba. Egha Livain anabamɨn adarasi, ia uaghan me batoke. Ia Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba ami moghɨn, ia uari uari bagha ofa gamir gumazir igharaziba amɨsefi. Gumazir kɨnitam ia bagh bulmakaun apurir igiatam ko 7pla sipsipɨn apuriba inigh izɨtɨ, ia puram anemɨseveghtɨ, a ian ifavarir asebar ofa gamir gumazimɨn otogham.
